_blog_export._blog_post_body: The weirdspace has oddly been my go to place to discover exquisite (unheard,forgotten,less known) masterpieces by women composers and authors. It's encouraging as well as disheartening to learn about the herstories but this only motivates me to keep pursuing my own. A big thanks go to Emily Hogstad for being an inspiration. Support her fantastic research on https://songofthelarkblog.com/

_blog_export._body:
The weirdspace has oddly been my go to place to discover exquisite (unheard,forgotten,less known) masterpieces by women composers and authors. It's encouraging as well as disheartening to learn about the herstories but this only motivates me to keep pursuing my own. A big thanks go to Emily Hogstad for being an inspiration. Support her fantastic research on https://songofthelarkblog.com/
